title: Bi-Weekly Music Discussion Thread
selftext:
What is r/India listening to? Share and discuss songs, playlists, artists, or anything music-related here!

If you're a musician yourself, please share your work so we can all hear what up-and-coming musicians are doing these days.

Don't just mention stuff, link it! Links that are official and provided by the artists themselves are preferred.

**Music Thread is posted every two weeks on Tuesday mornings |** [**Old Threads**](https://reddit.com/r/india/search?q=Bi-Weekly+Music+Discussion+Thread&restrict_sr=on&sort=new&t=all)

https://preview.redd.it/06d0xwq1x8n61.png?width=1487&format=png&auto=webp&s=4195dbb767ebd70a3209ea46a4497062e788c176
comments: Interested in Hip Hop, Rap. Which would be a good artist to listen to? I have already listened to Eminem a whole lot.
Brodha V - A real gem. His lyrics are on point.
Yeah, I recently heard a song of his. Can you suggest a few songs of his to listen to?

Almost all his songs are amazing like 

*Aathma Raama*
*All Divine*
*Shook Ones* 
*Aigiri Nandini*
*Vainko*
*Round Round*

If you know Urdu/Hindi then check out **Young Stunners** and **KR$NA**
Kendrick Lamar is one of the best rappers of our time, check him out
thank you. any songs you suggest?
good kid, m.A.A.d city is my favorite album of his. Just listen to that back to back, it's an experience.
Humble, loyalty, Moneytree, Alright, All the stars,  Bitch don't kill my vibe, DNA, Pride some of my favourites
Nas, one of the greatest rappers of all time and his debut album illmatic is considered by many as the best hip hop album
